body:
Well some of you may already know about this but here's a technique I used in the 1v1s earlier against kycraftt, Steven, Slicorn and TNTTurtles. To do it you have to not just block hit you have to press right click at the right moment to enchance knock back.

heres a video to help you :) https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=1mUPKMrBzlU

title: PvP secrets :O
